resources.string: This BMI App Was Created By Me App Creators Inspired by No one
Very severely underweight, Poor BMI, More Weight needed
Severely underweight, Please add more weight
Normal, Good BMI Keep it up
Overweight, Please you can check your weight, almost there
Obese Moderately, Your BMI is not bad but you are not far from a normal BMI
Obese Fairly, you can exercise and reduce your weight, your BMI is not really cool
Obese Severely, Ensure You reduce your weight
